name: Real Time News
description:
[EN] Real Time News is a news program known for transmitting the news in the moment they happen. For this, the news team relies on the skills of Reporter, the reporter, to go where the news are whatever the cost, even if he had to make them happen personally.          

          

[PT-BR] Real Time News é um noticiário conhecido por transmitir as notícias assim que elas acontecem. Para isso, a equipe de notícias conta com as habilidades de Reporter, o repórter, para ir atrás destas notícias custe o que custar, mesmo que ele tenha que fazê-las acontecer pessoalmente.

CONTROLS:

Arrow keys to move

Spacebar/Enter to interact with objects

Esc to pause, save and quit to title screen

Shift to run (works when driving)
